column4: hey guys, I'm getting LBA and CHS mismatch errors after I partition my dual boot setup and when I rewrite the MBR using testdisk it skips my grub bootloader and boots right to windows...
any ideas or anyone come across this problem before?
daklan... newcomer to bittorrent huh?
what do you consider  "features"?
torrents are slow?  compared to what kelvin?
well if you can find everything on rapidshare at 1250kbps then i'd go for it then
ok, so having problems getting a dualboot online after partitioning... anyone have any dualboot experience in here?
kelvin, you ever run into any chs and lba mismatch errors?
no, xp first then ubuntu afterwards
what?
azureus
rapidshare or megaupload are faster than torrent shit
azureus now has vuze attached to it, and i've tried it twice, without vuze worked great! with vuze was a mess the standalone updater went horribly
I would love to know where you got that assumption
i have azureus without that vuze thing
i can download from rapidshare 1200KB/s
i dwonload 700MB movie in 15 min
also torrents have the benefit of community vetting
can u do that in torrent?
i bet u cant download at that speed with all torrent files
you are correct, but show me a a rapidshare library as large as the torrent clouds out there and free of viruses and malware and I'll stop using torrents
http://www.warez-bb.org/ one of my fav
